lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The group comprising Federation Nationale du Batiment, Caisse Nationale de Surcompensation du Batiment et des Travaux Publics, Societe Mutuelle d'Assurance du Batiment et des Travaux Publics and Societe Mutuelle d'Assurance sur la Vie du Batiment et des Travaux Publics received 20.5 pct of capital.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Private individuals investing in the public share offer will receive a one-for-10 free share issue if they hold the shares for at least 18 months, up to a limit of five free shares, while employees and former employees will be entitled to discounts of between five and 20 pct on the issue price.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A third group comprising Credit Commercial de France (CCF), <Banque Hervet>, Comptoir des Entrepreneurs and Comptoir Central de Materiel d'Entreprise received eight pct of capital.
